isDietParameterOnlyPlan

public boolean isDietParameterOnlyPlan()
If the PlanTypeBO is PlanTypeBO.NUTRITION_RECOMMENDATION, the DietPlanBO is only for DietParameterBO and it's not possible to add MealLineBOs

Returns:
True if DietPlanBO is of type PlanTypeBO.NUTRITION_RECOMMENDATION
